1151.content: What world are you in?
1151.title: Pikachu

11511.content: Final question, are you a boy or a girl?
11511.title: Human Pokèmon World

choices: A wild Ralts running towards you
A wild Charizard running towards you
115111.content:
Cold. The feeling surrounds you. Fire. It burns within you. Electricity. This is what you become. You awake to the sound of wind brushing through leaves and cloudy skies above. A cold nip is in the air and darkness is on the ground.
         'Where am I?' you think to yourself, 'How did I get here?' you look around at the surrounding woodland and scratch your head. It seems... fuzzier than usual. You look at your hand and realize that it's covered in yellow fur. In shock, you jump up and look at yourself, "I'm... a Pikachu!" Your exclamation is lost in the sound of thunder overhead. You look up into the sky to see the legendary bird of fire, Ho-oh, Flying in the clouds. "What is going on?" Ho-oh never appears unless something is wrong. Something then makes a sound behind you and you turn to see...
115111.title: boy

choices: Takes you to its cave and spits you out(saved you from what it was running from)
1151112.content: The massive fire-type pokèmon comes sprinting out of the woods and is heading straight at you. As it's running with a frightened look in its eye it notices you in its path. You cry out in terror but your cries are lost in the wind and thunder. It continues running right at you and you try to get away from it but before you can it scoops you up in its mouth. You're quickly soaked in its saliva and tossed back and forth as the Charizard continues to run. It then...
1151112.title: A wild Charizard running towards you

choices: There's a certain power within you he sees
11511122.content:
As the charizard spits you out, you find yourself covered in saliva. "Oh, gross!" You find it difficult to shake it off like water since... well... it wasn't.

"I'm sorry I had to do that. But I just saved your life." You look up at the dragon as he looks down at you.

"Oh yeah? And what exactly did you save me from that was worth covering me in spit?"

"Don't be so ungrateful! I could have just went by you and left you for dead. Don't make me regret saving you."

"Okay, then answer me this... why did you save me?"

"You'd rather I left you there?"

"No, I mean, why the sudden interest in my well being?" The charizard looked at you and glances outside the cave. He answers you without eye contact.
11511122.title: Takes you to its cave and spits you out(saved y...

11512.content: Last question, are you a boy or a girl?
11512.title: Mystery Dungeon World

12121.content: Last question, are you a boy or a girl?
12121.title: Pokèmon/human world

choices: He can't understand you at all
121211.content:
You wake up, dizzy and in some kind of giant forest. You look around, stand up, and begin walking around. You notice that you don't have any hands and something feels different about your legs. You look down and realize that you have four of them.
         "What the..." you say to yourself. You run around for a moment until you cone across a small puddle. You look into the water and see a Chikorita staring right back at you. "Whoah, that's..." you break off as you are still debating if this is cool or not. You decide to walk around for a while, figuring that this was all a dream. Sunlight filters down through the trees and glints off the morning dew on the grass. 'Man this is a really realistic dream' you think to yourself, becoming lost in thought. Then, you run into a trainer who seemed to have come from out of nowhere. He picks you up and asks,
         "Are you okay? You seem a little disoriented." you nod and respond with a
         "Chik" meaning yes
         "Well that's good." He says. He then looks arounda moment and asks "Are you lost?" you think for a moment then nod your head. "Well... would you like to join my pokèmon team?" He asks. You think for a while 'Why not? I mean this is just a dream right? Well, I might as well butter this up.' You then jump on him saying
         "yes, yes, yes!" as you lick him on the face, knocking him over, he laughs and takes out a pokeball. You know how this works as you're sucked in by the red light and the ball on the outside rocks three times then clicks as you're captured. Next thing you know you're lying under a big shady tree next to a house when you get called out. You blink and look around looking for your master.

He comes from the house with a bowl of pokéfood that smells delightful and a sandwich.
         "Eat up, this pokéfood is made especially for grass types to boost their speed, attack, defense, and acurracy." He says. As you chow down you notice it's like eating heaven on a dish. 'Wait a second, you don't taste things in dreams.' you think. You give your front foot a little bite 'Ouch!' you suddenly realize that this is no dream.
         "My name is Dan." He says. You begin to breath a little faster and panic just a bit. "What's wrong?" Dan asks. You look up at him and try to explain that you're human. After a whole lot of sounds and acting things out you wait to see his response.
121211.title: Boy

12122.content: Last question, are you a boy or a girl?
12122.title: Mystery dungeon world

12131.content: Last question, are you a boy or a girl?
12131.title: Pokèmon/human world

12132.content: Last question, are you a boy or a girl?
12132.title: Mystery dungeon world

choices: You decide to head to the nearby town
121322.content:
Time. Something you need. Space. What needs you. Dreams. Are being disturbed. Grass. What you become. You wake up from another strange dream, sit up, and rub your eyes.
         "What? This isn't my room." you say as you look around. You're on a mountain surrounded by a forest. In the distance you see some kind of small town and a beach nearby it. Then you realize something, you can't feel your hair blowing in the light breeze... and your nose is... "Green?!" You exclaim, "Why is my nose green?!" At first you think it's a prank done by your little sister but then you notice that it's not even your nose. You look around for a puddle, a mirror, anything that you could see your reflection in. As you look around you see a small puddle with sunlight glinting off of it. You run over and gasp as you see in the puddle, a Snivy! "But... Why am I a Snivy? I can't remember." You say as you strain to think of what happened yesterday. No memories of anything unusual come to you.
121322.title: Girl

choices: A pokèmon comes out and talks to you (friendly)
You continue on towards the town alone
1213221.content:
*One panic attack later* You sit down and gather your thoughts.
         'Okay, I'm a Snivy... a Snivy... a- No! I am not going into that again!' you remember the nearby town, maybe they could help. You jump to your feet and begin making your way down the mountain with nothing but silence and your thoughts to keep you company. You hear something behind you and leap out of the way as a Sandshrew dives past you. "What the heck man!? You almost hit me." You say. The Sandshrew only turns back to you and prepares to attack again. As you prepare to dodge again you trip and land on your back. The Sandshrew darts forward, hoping to finish you before you stand back up. You scoot backwards quickly and find a strange seed on the ground. Without thinking you pop the seed in your mouth and bite down. It feels like your mouth is on fire and you roar in pain. As you do, fire shoots out of your mouth and hits the Sandshrew. Point-blank. Your foes in immediately K.O.'ed and blown away. "What was that?" You say to yourself.
1213221.title: You decide to head to the nearby town

122111.title: Boy

1431.content: What world are you in?
1431.title: Lugia

14311.content: Final Question, are you a boy or girl? (I know legendary pokèmon are usually gender confused but that doesn't really work in this situation.)
14311.title: Pokèmon Human World

choices: A small pokèmon is approaching you
143111.content:
You wake up to the sound of crashing waves and the smell of the sea. The sun beats down on your body and feels good against your skin.
         'What happened' You think as you sit up and look around at the beautiful beach, completely unaware of how you got there. A sudden dizzy spell catches you by surprise and you stumble awkwardly to the water. You catch yourself before you can face plant into the ground. However, out of the corner of your eye, you notice something. 'What the heck?' You think to yourself, your hand is completely white and looks almost like a wing. You jump over to the water and look at your reflection. You just about swallow your own tongue as you see a full sized Lugia staring back at you. You jump back and land right on the beach and freak out for just a moment before calming down. You take in a deep breath and sit down to think for a moment.
143111.title: boy

1431111.content: You look off to your left and see a small pokèmon approaching you. You can't quite tell what it is yet since it's so far away but as it approaches you see that it's a...
1431111.title: A small pokèmon is approaching you

choices: There's a huge wave heading for a nearby town!
My brother got trapped on a mountain while we were exploring!
14311112.content:
A small pikachu is approaching you and is looking rather... panicky. He doesn't even seem to notice you until he bumps right into you and falls over.
         "Hey! Watch where you're- oh... my... gosh... Please, please don't hurt me! I swear I didn't mean it!" He says as he gets down on his hands and knees to beg.
         "Hey, calm down. I'm not going to hurt you or eat you or whatever it is that pokèmon do... yeah." You say, slightly confused and at a loss as per what to say.
         "Really? Oh thank goodness!" He responds,
         "What was with all the freaking out earlier?" You ask. He responds...
14311112.title: Pikachu

choices: Decide to land in the town to accept the praise
Decide to fly off and think of what to do next
143111121.content:
"There's a nearby town that's about to be struck by a huge wave! All the people and pokemon will be wiped out!" he says. You are quite shock by this news, you've never heard of such a large wave before.
         "Perhaps I could help." You say,
         "Would you really?"
         "I'll do what I can. Jump on my back and show me where to go." you respond. The small Pikachu leaps up onto your back and you realize that you have no idea how to fly. 'Well how hard could it be?' you think to yourself as you extend your wings and push off the ground. Sand is kicked up in your wake as you take cautiously to the skies. You're a little shakey at first but flying seems to come naturally to you. The sea below is bright blue like the sun above you and if you didn't know better you'd think nothing was wrong.
         "Just keep on your current course and you'll see the town soon." the Pikachu says. You can't believe how amazing it feels to fly, it's like jumping out of an airplane and then going up. Angling your wings right is the hardest part so your probably flap more than you need to, but hey, at least you're going somewhere other than down. You soon spot the village which seems to be in the process of evacuating. "Look! There's the wave!" Pikachu shouted. You turn you head to see a massive wave heading right for the town.
         'Now what do I do?' You think to yourself. As the wave approaches you feel something building up in your chest. The pressure continues to build in your chest and suddenly launches up your throat and is released through your mouth. A huge laser springs forth from your maw and strikes the wave and blasts it apart.
         "That was amazing!" Pikachu cries. The town had stopped panicing by now and began to cheer. You...
143111121.title: There's a huge wave heading for a nearby town!

1431111211.content:
You turn back and observe the town you just saved. A great feeling of fulfillment sweeps over you and you can't resist going down and accepting some of that praise. You beat your wings against the sky and steer yourself to the docks of the town where a small crowd has gathered. They step back to give you room to land as you make a shaky decent (not bad for your first landing) and land on the dock. The crowd cheers for a moment saying,
         "Thank you!"
         "You're the best!"
         "Thanks Lugia!" And a variety of other things as well. A man walks up to you (you assume it's the mayor) and says,
         "On behalf of our town, I would like to present you with this." He pulls out a bag with a rather large strap and slips it around your neck. "I'm sure you will find the items inside to be very useful, thank you once again." He said as the town began to cheer again.

         From the back of the crowd a man slips away to a nearby phone booth and dials a number.
         "Yes? Who is this?"
         "A servant of ice and fire."
         "Speak."
         "A silver bird has been sighted."
         "That's impossible, we destroyed them all."
         "This is undoubtedly a silver bird, no question."
         "I shall have to report this, Lord Kyurem will not be pleased."
1431111211.title: Decide to land in the town to accept the praise

choices: You find a cave in a high mountain
You rest on the forest floor
14311112111.content:
You continue to fly through the sky, pondering on what to do next.
         "Hey, can we find a place to rest soon? I'm exhausted." The Pikachu on your back says.
         "Alright, help me find a place to land."
         "I still say we should have stayed at the town. The would've gladly let us spend the night." The small creature complains.
         "Well then why don't I just drop you here and you can walk back?"
         "No, no, no, it's fine! I was just kidding! Ha ha ha." He chuckles nervously.
14311112111.title: Continue

143111121111.content:
"Hm?" You spot something upon the face of the nearby mountain and you identify it as a cave. "How about there?" You ask pointing your head towards your discovery.

"Anywhere's fine really, but I guess a cave would be better than just landing in the forest." The pikachu said noticing the cave that you spotted a moment ago. You nod and fly down to it and land with a noticable thud against the rocky ground.
143111121111.title: You find a cave in a high mountain

15.content:
What about Riolu or Lucario?

Or what about difffere Pokemon?
15.title: Riolu/Lucario?

info.brief_description: You've been transformed into a pokèmon, what will you do?
info.description: This is an interactive story about how you one day transform into a pokèmon. You can either be in the normal human pokèmon world or in the pokèmon mystery dungeon world that has no humans. You can be a mean pokèmon or nice, whatever you want. In this interactive pokèmon don't die no matter what happens, they only faint. Soft oral vore is allowed but pokèmon (including you) cannot be digested. Follow the basic physics of pokèmon so no growing or shrinking is allowed. ABSOLUTELY NO SEXUAL ACTIVITY IS ALLOWED any chapters breaking this rule will be deleted. There can be love or romance scenes if you really want them but no sensual activity is allowed, keep it clean. Keep in the same tense and POV (point of view) as well and make sure to use good grammar. I reserve the right to edit any chapters that break these rules. Other than that, go wild and have fun!
info.pretty_title: Pokèmon Mystery Dungeon: A New Day
